name: Bose Soundbar 700 Smart Speaker With Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant and Bass Module 500 Subwoofer - Black  | Dell USA
description: You don't just want to hear your movies, music, and TV. You want to feel the crushing footsteps of a T-Rex on the screen, the roar of the crowd when the underdogs win the game, and the heart-pumping, beat-stomping chorus in your favorite song. The Bose Soundbar 700. Featuring an unmatched combination of sophisticated design and exceptional sound, this slim soundbar is packed with technologies that bring out the full power in every moment of your entertainment.
